root.name: Arthur and the Revenge of Maltazard
root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimumProcessor : Intel Pentium IV at 3.0GHz / AMD Athlon 64 3500 +Video Card : 256 MB VRAM – DirectX 9.0 Video card with support for Shader Model 3.0 (Nvidia GeForce 7600GT / ATI Radeon X1600)Memory : 1 GB for Windows XP / 2 GB for Windows VistaOperating System : Microsoft Windows XP SP3 / Windows Vista SP2RecommendedProcessor : Intel Core 2 Duo at 2.0GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4000Video Card : 512 MB VRAM – DirectX 9.0 Video card with support for Shader Model 3.0 (Nvidia GeForce 9800GT / ATI Radeon HD 4850 )Memory : 2 GBOperating System : Microsoft Windows XP SP3 / Windows Vista SP2
